mapper.select: select pmb.* ,dept.dept_name,dept.dept_no from personnel_monthly_base pmb join tb_other_staff sc on pmb.staff_id = sc.staff_id left JOIN ts_dept dept on pmb.dept_id = dept.dept_id where pmb.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update personnel_monthly_base set the_month=#{the_month}, monthly_type=#{monthly_type}, dept_id=#{dept_id}, staff_id=#{staff_id}, version_no = version_no + 1 where id=#{id} and verify_userid is null

update personnel_monthly_base set verify_userid = #{verify_userid}, verify_username = #{verify_username}, verify_datetime = #{verify_datetime} , version_no = version_no + 1 where id=#{id} and verify_userid is null
update personnel_monthly_base set verify_userid = null, verify_username = null, verify_datetime = null , version_no = version_no + 1 where id=#{id} and verify_userid is not null
